## Type of change

- [ ] New plugin
- [ ] Bug fix in existing plugin
- [ ] Plugin improvement / new tool
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Other

## Plugin checklist (new plugins only)

- [ ] Plugin compiles with `tsc --noEmit` â€” zero TypeScript errors
- [ ] Compiled `dist/<id>.js` is committed and up to date
- [ ] `README.md` included with setup instructions and tool reference
- [ ] All write/delete/send tools have `requiresApproval: true`
- [ ] Plugin does not log or transmit credentials anywhere
- [ ] Plugin only makes requests to the service it integrates with
- [ ] Tested locally with real credentials
- [ ] Plugin ID, name, and description are ready for `registry.json`
